1.6.name: wordpress/propel
1.6.description:
This plugin enables you to manage your projects from the WordPress interface you are already comfortable with. Easily create and track the progress of projects and tasks.

If you are having issues with this plugin you may submit a comment here or ask on the WordPress forum.
